ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET POLICY IP Check Domain (iplogger .org in DNS Lookup)
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET POLICY IP Check Domain (iplogger .org in DNS Lookup)"; dns.query; content:"iplogger.org"; endswith; classtype:policy-violation; sid:2035948; rev:4; metadata:created_at 2017_11_27, former_category POLICY, updated_at 2020_09_15;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET POLICY IP Check Domain (iplogger .org in TLS SNI)
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET POLICY IP Check Domain (iplogger .org in TLS SNI)"; flow:established,to_server; tls.sni; content:"iplogger.org"; endswith; nocase; classtype:policy-violation; sid:2035949; rev:4; metadata:created_at 2017_11_27, former_category POLICY, updated_at 2020_09_15;)
